title: Pixel 1 updated to Android 10 Game graphics lagged
content:
Played TsumTsum game on Pixel 1 through all the Android updates.

Even with Force 4X MSAA and Window animation 2x enabled, the game has crazy lag. The game no longer gives the smooth game play.

Worst still, the Force 4X MSAA setting will be disabled after every phone restart. This makes it irritating to have constantly to reenable it.
